name: Auturia Matrix Brute
description: The MatrixBrute is a 100% analog, 100% digital, 100% awesome synthesizer. It is a 4-voice, 2-part, 2-oscillator, 2-filter, 2-LFO, 2-EG, 2-ADSR, 2-AD, 2-sequencer, 2-voice polyphonic, 2-voice paraphonic, 2-voice unison, 2-voice duophonic, 2-voice monophonic, 2-voice paraphonic
